q: Never close your lips to those whom you have already opened your heart
He that can have patience can have what he will
There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you
All that a man achieves and all that he fails to achieve is the direct result of his own thoughts
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently
In the practice of tolerance, ones enemy is the best teacher
If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading
Peace is not something you wish for, its something you make, something you do, something you are, and something you give away
To be great is to be misunderstood
Motivation gets you going and habit gets you there
Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears
We crave for new sensations but soon become indifferent to them. The wonders of yesterday are today common occurrences
Dont shortchange yourself when it comes to investing in your own better future
By the practice of meditation, you will find that you are carrying within your heart a portable paradise
Shoot for the moon, because even if you miss, youll land among the stars
Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak
Courage is found in unlikely places
Fiction is the truth inside the lie
The best teacher is experience and not through someones distorted point of view
Freedom lies in being bold
Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people wholl argue with you
Be yourself, everyone else is already taken
If anything is worth doing, do it with all your heart
If you correct your mind, the rest of your life will fall into place
True wealth is of the heart, not of the purse
Dream big and dare to fail
It is what we make out of what we have, not what we are given, that separates one person from another
We turn not older with years but newer every day
To lead the people, walk behind them
Never do to others what you would not like them to do to you
The real meditation is how you live your life
Just do the best you can. No one can do more than that
Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work
If you want to see things just as they are, then you yourself must practice just as you are
Most people fail in life not because they aim too high and miss, but because they aim too low and hit
If light is in your heart, you will find your way home
Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed
What you become is far more important than what you get
Its not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently
The secret of happiness is not in doing what you like but in liking what you have to do
In life you need either inspiration or desperation
The truth is not for all men, but for those who seek it
I wasnt brave I just didnt have time to be scared
Peace begins with a smile
Be, dont try to become
To improve is to change, so to be perfect is to change often
The first rule of handling conflict is dont hang around people who are constantly engaging in conflict
Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens
Let us rather run the risk of wearing out than rusting out
Failure is feedback. Learn from it and move on
